thread.title: Bulls let a second player wear Derrick Rose's old jersey number — fans weren't happy | NBA | Sporting News
thread.title_full: Bulls let a second player wear Derrick Rose's old jersey number — fans weren't happy | NBA | Sporting News

author: Matt Ellentuck
title: Bulls let a second player wear Derrick Rose's old jersey number — fans weren't happy | NBA | Sporting News
text:
February 25, 2017 12:39am EST February 25, 2017 12:36am EST Bulls fans are serious about their Derrick Rose fandom. Anthony Morrow (Getty Images) 
Updated at 12:39 a.m. ET 
Updated at 12:39 a.m. ET 
Anthony Morrow was traded to the Chicago Bulls just before the deadline on Thursday. With a new team comes a new jersey number. 
Morrow picked the wrong one, and now he's changing it. 
The sharpshooter chose the No. 1. You may remember the last guy to rock that number at the United Center. His name is Derrick Rose, and Bulls fans take his jersey number seriously. @highkin damn, already gave away Drose number. Bulls give Drose no respect — King Russell (@bigdiesel33) February 24, 2017 @Bassewitz24 @NickFriedell he better! Not a fan already. Respect the legacy! — Tim Hanrahan (Tibs) (@Sgt_Tibs) February 25, 2017 @NickFriedell no no no no I don't like that
